item.title: House, Senate briefings on Iran-Israel conflict postponed
item.description: Lawmakers will be looking for answers and evidence from the administration.

item.title: WATCH: Worldâ€™s largest digital camera captures stunning images of galaxies
item.description: The Rubin telescope, sitting at the top of the Cerro Pachon mountains in Chile, captured galaxies 55 million lightyears away.

item.title: Trump blurts out expletive as he lashes out at Israel and Iran over ceasefire
item.description: President Trump blurted out an expletive as he aired frustration with Israel and Iran, accusing both nations of violating a ceasefire agreement.

item.title: On way to NATO summit, Trump refuses to commit to Article 5 mutual defense agreement
item.description: Trump departing for NATO summit in the Netherlands days after he launched strikes against Iran and hours after he announced a Israel-Iran ceasefire.

item.title: Consumer confidence sours, despite rollback of Trump's tariffs
item.description: Some major retailers have warned of price increases.
